1370: Lutgeri moved to Verckens merct.A.1 after marriage.
Got married to Hilduardis at age 26 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Hilduardis, Thedwi, at age 27.
1372: Had a daughter with Hilduardis, Aleydis, at age 28.
1373: Had a daughter with Hilduardis, Godeweris, at age 29.
1374: Had a son with Hilduardis, Woutermanne, at age 30.
1380: Had a daughter with Hilduardis, Natelien, at age 36.
1381: Had a son with Hilduardis, Willai, at age 37.
1383: Had a daughter with Hilduardis, Atghardis, at age 39.
1384: Had a daughter with Hilduardis, Beatrice, at age 40.
Lost daughter Aleydis when Aleydis was 13 years old.
Lost son Woutermanne when Woutermanne was 11 years old.
